always protect and provide for our family

i have this saying to ensure everyone in the family lives by. and that is, "every problem is just an opportunity"! oracle, anyone can see any situation as full of problems or seen as full of opportunities. we garnetts choose the latter, to be positive in everything we can. its obvious your a garnett (thats our last name) as you constantly smile and crack on when faced with challenges or setbacks. we garnetts push through until we overcome, and we persevere when clobbered with failure because we stay possitive and we learn from everything!

alwaysbe thinking about how to make dad money for the family small ideas or big ideas just as long as theyre possible and not going to get daddy in trouble with the law remember we always look out for family we keep them safe from incarceration and financial poverty! figure out how to make money for dad!
